casebody.data:
176 A.3d 219 NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF CHILD PROTECTION AND PERMANENCY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. R.L.M., DEFENDANT, AND J.J., DEFENDANT-PETITIONER. IN THE MATTER OF THE GUARDIANSHIP OF R.A.J., A MINOR-RESPONDENT.

C-335 September Term 2017

079473 December 1, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

*415A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2849/3277-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
